verses.verse: <S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G4103>true<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3713>desires<s%> the office of a <S%G1984>bishop<s%>, he <S%G1937>desires<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>.

A <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G423>blameless<s%>, the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G3524>vigilant<s%>, <S%G4998>sober<s%>, of good <S%G2887>behavior<s%>, given to <S%G5382>hospitality<s%>, apt to <S%G1317>teach<s%>;

<S%G3361>Not<s%> given to <S%G3943>wine<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4131>violent<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy for filthy <S%G146>money<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1933>patient<s%>, not a <S%G269>brawler<s%>, not <S%G866>covetous<s%>;

<S%G1161>(For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>how<s%> to <S%G4291>rule<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, <S%G4459>how<s%> shall he take <S%G1959>care<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?)
<S%G3361>Not<s%> a <S%G3504>novice<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> being lifted up with <S%G5187>pride<s%> he <S%G1706>falls<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2917>condemnation<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3141>report<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> them which are <S%G1855>outside<s%>; <S%G3361>lest<s%> he <S%G1706>falls<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3680>reproach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.

<S%G5615>Likewise<s%> must the <S%G1249>deacons<s%> be <S%G4586>grave<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1351>doubletongued<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> given <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy for filthy <S%G146>money<s%>;

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1381>let<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be <S%G1381>proved<s%>; <S%G1534>then<s%> let them serve in the office of a <S%G1247>deacon<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> found <S%G410>blameless<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> they that have served in the office of a <S%G1247>deacon<s%> <S%G2573>honestly<s%>, <S%G4046>purchase<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G898>standing<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I stay <S%G1019>long<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> you <S%G1163>should<s%> behave <S%G390>yourself<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G4769>pillar<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1477>ground<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> without <S%G3672>controversy<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness<s%>: <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G3700>seen<s%> by <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> the <S%G1484>Nations<s%>, believed <S%G4100>on<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.
